mapper.select: SELECT sys_permissions.id, sys_permissions.permission, sys_permissions.description, sys_permissions.available FROM sys_permissions LEFT JOIN sys_roles_permissions ON sys_permissions.id = sys_roles_permissions.permission_id WHERE sys_roles_permissions.role_id = #{role_id}

SELECT sys_permissions.id, sys_permissions.permission, sys_permissions.description, sys_permissions.available FROM sys_permissions LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM sys_users_roles LEFT JOIN sys_roles_permissions ON sys_users_roles.role_id = sys_roles_permissions.role_id) ON sys_permissions.id = sys_users_roles.permission_id WHERE sys_users.id = #{user.id}
